name: Body Fit Race
description:
body fit race it's new beauty run game, it's challenging game make you have fun and look beauty and fabulous even if become your body look fit or fat.

on this beauty run there is no weight limit you can make your body fit or fat! Own the runway by the win and race to the finish line.

Get fit to fat or fat to fit in the race to win! All sizes are beautiful and necessary to win the level, choose your diet or choose how you want your body look like a fit or fat by picking up the obstacles: various food and fitness gear like burger and broccoli.

in this new beauty run game you can become Fit to fat or Fat to fit deepening on the goal of levels and how you like your body become.

So pick up those heels and tackle those pesky obstacles in this body race and pick up the things that really help you rish the target a fit body or fat body.
